name: The Legendary Lost And The Only One Left Mystical Stone
name_original: The Legendary Lost And The Only One Left Mystical Stone
description: This is a game that me and my partner, Ady26 (https://ady26.itch.io/) made it in a single week for the Community Gam Jam 2019. This was our first game jam and we really enjoyed making it. Because of the time limit there is room for improvements, and we want to continue this project on the future. Also, we have put a lot of effort into it (every day we woke up early, we worked and then slept).  The last part is a little bit too hard because we didn't had the time to test it right, but with great skills you can do it!
